languages.text: "Память об утрате всегда сильнее памяти об обретении, особенно когда теряешь нечто столь великое, как дом. Мир".
"The memory of a loss is always stronger than the memory of a gain, especially when you lose something as significant as a home. Or an entire world."
languages.original_text: "Память об утрате всегда сильнее памяти об обретении, особенно когда теряешь нечто столь великое, как дом. Мир".

traits.locale_text: "The memory of a loss is always stronger than the memory of a gain, especially when you lose something as significant as a home. Or an entire world."
"The memory of a loss is always stronger than the memory of a gain, especially when you lose something as significant as a home. Or an entire world."
"The memory of a loss is always stronger than the memory of a gain, especially when you lose something as significant as a home. Or an entire world."
"The memory of a loss is always stronger than the memory of a gain, especially when you lose something as significant as a home. Or an entire world."
"The memory of a loss is always stronger than the memory of a gain, especially when you lose something as significant as a home. Or an entire world."

languages.text: “与获得的甜蜜相比，失去的痛苦总是更加强烈，尤其当你失去的是家园这么重要的东西……或是整个世界。”
languages.original_text: "The memory of a loss is always stronger than the memory of a gain, especially when you lose something as significant as a home. Or an entire world."

traits.locale_text: “与获得的甜蜜相比，失去的痛苦总是更加强烈，尤其当你失去的是家园这么重要的东西……或是整个世界。”

languages.text: 「何かを失った記憶はいつも何かを得た記憶よりも強い。故郷のように、あるいは世界のように、とても大切なものを失った時は特に」
languages.original_text: "The memory of a loss is always stronger than the memory of a gain, especially when you lose something as significant as a home. Or an entire world."

traits.locale_text: 「何かを失った記憶はいつも何かを得た記憶よりも強い。故郷のように、あるいは世界のように、とても大切なものを失った時は特に」

languages.text: « Le souvenir d'une perte est toujours plus fort que celui d'un gain, surtout quand on perd quelque chose d'aussi important que son foyer. Ou un monde entier. »
languages.original_text: "The memory of a loss is always stronger than the memory of a gain, especially when you lose something as significant as a home. Or an entire world."

traits.locale_text: « Le souvenir d'une perte est toujours plus fort que celui d'un gain, surtout quand on perd quelque chose d'aussi important que son foyer. Ou un monde entier. »

languages.text: «El recuerdo de una pérdida siempre es mayor que el recuerdo de algo que se consigue, sobre todo si pierdes algo tan valioso como tu hogar. O un mundo entero».
languages.original_text: "The memory of a loss is always stronger than the memory of a gain, especially when you lose something as significant as a home. Or an entire world."

traits.locale_text: «El recuerdo de una pérdida siempre es mayor que el recuerdo de algo que se consigue, sobre todo si pierdes algo tan valioso como tu hogar. O un mundo entero».

languages.text: "Die Erinnerung an etwas Verlorenes ist immer stärker denn die an etwas Gewonnenes, besonders, wenn man etwas so Bedeutsames wie ein Zuhause verliert. Oder eine ganze Welt."
languages.original_text: "The memory of a loss is always stronger than the memory of a gain, especially when you lose something as significant as a home. Or an entire world."

traits.locale_text: "Die Erinnerung an etwas Verlorenes ist immer stärker denn die an etwas Gewonnenes, besonders, wenn man etwas so Bedeutsames wie ein Zuhause verliert. Oder eine ganze Welt."

languages.text: "Kaybettiğin bir şeyin hatırası, her daim kazandığın bir şeyin hatırasından güçlüdür. Hele ki yuvan veya bir dünyanın tamamı kadar önemli bir şey kaybettiysen..."
languages.original_text: "The memory of a loss is always stronger than the memory of a gain, especially when you lose something as significant as a home. Or an entire world."

traits.locale_text: "Kaybettiğin bir şeyin hatırası, her daim kazandığın bir şeyin hatırasından güçlüdür. Hele ki yuvan kadar önemli bir şey kaybettiysen ya da... Bir dünyanın tamamını..."
